@@ -5155,3 +5155,3 @@
-// "off" is probably not within the encoding range for LDR/STR instructions
-// with an immediate offset. legitimize_address() will fix out-of-range
-// operands by generating a lea before the address can be used.
+// "off" may not be within the encoding range for LDR/STR instructions
+// with an immediate offset. In that case, legitimize_address() will fix
+// out-of-range operands by generating a lea before the address is used.
@@ -5172,3 +5172,3 @@
-// "off" is probably not within the encoding range for LDR/STR instructions
-// with an immediate offset. legitimize_address() will fix out-of-range

+// with an immediate offset. In that case, legitimize_address() will fix
+// out-of-range operands by generating a lea before the address is used.
